title: Lydia's banana cupcakes
ingredients: ['55g (2 oz) margerine', '2 eggs', '55g (2 oz) butter', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '110g (4 oz) plain flour', '2 medium sized ripe bananas', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '55g (2 oz) butter', '110g (4 oz) icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'a few pieces of dried bananas for decoration']
